author: Brooke Sweeney, Michael Learmonth
title: We Asked Millennials and Gen Z How They're Coping With the Pandemic. Here's What They Said.
description: According to the study, “Youth in Pandemic,” 87% of young people believe they are, “doing everything they can to limit the spread of coronavirus.”
content: Its been more than a month since the World Health Organization declared the coronavirus a global pandemic. As recorded cases climb above 2.5 million, hundreds of millions of people across the globe have spent weeks in some cases, months quarantined in their h… [+3990 chars]
